content: As an AI language model, I don't have feelings, but I can provide an answer to your concern. It's not uncommon to feel guilty when setting boundaries, especially if you're not used to it. However, setting boundaries is an act of self-care and self-respect, and it's essential for a healthy relationship. It may take time to adjust to setting and enforcing boundaries, but with practice, it will become easier. Remember, you have the right to set boundaries and communicate your needs in a relationship. It's not mean or unloving to prioritize your well-being.
